A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Amazing movie\, haters will see whatever they want in it. I saw no political agenda\, only a good movie that managed to surprise the heck out of me. Not a derivative of ESB\, like Force Awakens was of ANH. It was an original idea taken in a direction I never expected but loved none the less. Luke SkyWalker was done so well\, and there's even a very special Cameo by everyone's favorite puppet with wise words to help our former hero back to a good path. The best Star Wars movie to date in my opinion\, RIP Carrie Fisher.
